Join Our Team

At Point Of, we’re a team of dreamers, makers, and critical thinkers who bring bold ideas to life. We thrive on collaboration, agility, and creativity—building solutions that make an impact.
We know that the best work comes from bringing together great people and great ideas, from diverse backgrounds, experiences, and communities. Our ambition is to create a workplace where everyone feels comfortable bringing their authentic selves to work every day.
We welcome talent across disciplines, valuing the unique perspectives that shape our work. If you’re passionate about humanizing technology, user experiences and believe you have the skills to contribute, even as a collaborator or partner, we’d love to hear from you. Send us what you’ve been working on, and let’s connect.
people@wearepointof.com
Job & Internship applications (Max 10 MB):
people@wearepointof.com

Current
Vacancies

Front-End Developer

Location
Remote
Experience
3+ years
Required skills
JavaScript, ES6, HTML, SASS/SCSS, jQuery, GIT
A clear brand positioning or brand purpose is the foundation success is built on. Through our tailor-made immersion we get to really know you. We ask questions, run audits, lead workshops, discover what makes you and your audience tick, and use all our insight and experience to align thinking and help generate both internal direction and a customer-centric voice.
Skill requirements
A
Good knowledge of JavaScript (ES6), CSS, and HTML
B
Previous experience with jQuery library. Bonus: jQuery plugin development experience
C
Experience in the development of CSS-based animations
D
Proper use of SCSS variables, imports and exports, and mixins
E
Understanding of project bundling with Gulp
